trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Cape May
There were no other sightings in Cape May on or around September 11th 2011
divs: sighting details at a 9\11 memorial, cape may point n.j., b4 ceremony a large helicopter flew over area. during ceremony noticed object in front of a bright white cloud, no sound, no lights, no movement. a few other people noticed it in the sky, approx over cape may beach, west of coast guard base. a thunder storm rolled in over the bay as ceremony ended. we were able to keep eyes on object while walking to car, drove in direction of object, however storm intensified with heavy rain & lightning and we lost sight of the object.
